mdRecord.dcterms:title: Walthers Preislied = Walter's prize song : aus der Oper Die Meistersinger von Richard Wagner / F. Bendel
Walter's prize song
Wagner, Richard, 1813-1883. Meistersinger von Nürnberg. Morgenlich leuchtend im rosigen Schein; arr
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Wagner, Richard, 1813-1883 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: List t.p. illustration: Putti flanking a crown surrounded by ribbons upon which names of composers are inscribed. Below are two columns with wind player and harpist inscribed, lions on top, and portraits of composers in the base. Between the columns is a scene from a concert hall.. [original]

Advertisement on t.p. verso: Christmas Bells : gavotte / Carl Sidius. On p. [10]: What competent critics say of Kunkel's royal edition. On p. [11]: Careless elegance : quickstep / Geo. Schleiffarth. On p. [12]: Alpine storm : a summer idyl / Charles Kunkel. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Operas--Excerpts, Arranged
Piano music, Arranged
